programme.desc: A soon-to-be priest starts questioning his commitment to priesthood as he runs into his mentor’ niece, a bubbly girl who has just returned from the US to visit her boyfriend.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Based on true events, a renowned mountaineer sets out on a mission to Everest to retrieve his late junior climber's body and faces the greatest challenge of his life.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they’ve switched bodies.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: I Am Father

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gangster 3

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: China Trending Now Ep7
programme.desc: As a fashion reality show, Justin Huang, Austin Li, Laurinda Ho and Shang Guan Zhe are invited to cooperate with the young talents to complete different tasks and outfits in the show to demonstrate their aesthetics and attitudes, and also reflect the trend and attitude towards life among the young generation.

programme.title: The Lucky 2% Ep2
programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.title: Sisters’ Treats Ep10
programme.desc: Ada Choi, Athena Chu, Monica Chan, and Catherine Hung, who are being friends for 30 years, work as partners to operate a restaurant together. With a young actor to be the manager in the restaurant, some activities with special features and gimmicks will be held to attract the young generations to visit and “check in”.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep2
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: The Talent Season 2 Ep2
programme.desc: The first Gen Z competition reality show - 12 teenagers were selected to join the "Tsing Pek Summer Camp" and test their problem-solving skills. Xie Nan, Jiang Changjian, and Wei Kunlin (Dr. Wei) were formed as a guardian group, together with Ding Ruoxu, Leo Li, Jay Song, etc. who jointly escort the players on the "Ling-guang Island Tour".

programme.title: The Delicacy Ep3
programme.desc: Representatives in various fields are invited to submit creative recipes; top chefs fight for the interesting one and cook accordingly. Allen Lin, Meng Mei Qi, and David Wang gather as the judges to select and add the outstanding dishes in to the menu of winners.

programme.title: Study On The Island Ep10
programme.desc: How to enjoy reading in an Island? Special bookstore is tailor-made for the famous authors & writers like Hua Yu, Tong Zhonggui, Xi Chuan, etc. on their thirst for reading and writing at Boundary Island in Hainan.

programme.title: Great Dance Crew Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Dance survival show which gathered professional dancers and trainees audition to become part of the final dance crew. Focusing on the new genre, in addition to the return of "Old Veterans" Santa Uno and Cheng Xiao, Rainie Yang, Jessica Jung, Kido Gao, Sdanny Lee were invited as mentors. Total 6 brand-new-star groups joined forces to fight for dignity to the end, and competed for the honor.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep95
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10171018
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45854586
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45864587
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2018
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3581
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2607
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3581
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45874588
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10211022
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1037
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1037
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep48
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep195196
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Pingtung Spring Music Festival(M) Ep1
programme.desc: Pingtung Spring Music Festival is an annual activity held in every April in Pingtung, Taiwan. This year line-up is even stronger than last year, let's celebrate Spring with all the well-known artistes!

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep2223
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair…

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him…

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son’s arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the “Tsai Li Fu” style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan’s first major movies) for an evocative and terrific “Martial arts world” adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Neighborhood (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Welcome to Grover's Birthday - When Dave and Gemma's elaborate plans for Grover's 7th birthday party go awry, Malcolm and Marty come to the rescue; and Calvin's choice of gift winds up sending one person to the hospital.

programme.title: Brotherhood (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Pregnant - Twenty-somethings Dan and Toby become surrogate parents to little brother Jamie after their mum passes away. Thrust into a new world of responsibility, Dan and Toby are in over their heads.

programme.title: Judge Judy (S23) Ep15
programme.desc: A woman buys a used car 'as is' but doesn't fully understand the meaning of that. A man admits that he put all the responsibility of finding a new tenant on his pregnant roommate's shoulders.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: Lea Michele Exclusive - Drew is on location at New York City's August Wilson Theater for an exclusive sit-down with 'Funny Girl' Lea Michele.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: The Untouchables is a must-see masterpiece - glorious, fierce, larger-than-life depiction of the mob warlord who ruled Prohibition-era Chicago and the law enforcer who vowed to bring him down.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep16
programme.desc: Quinta Brunson - Your host tonight Quinta Brunson.

programme.title: Judge Judy (S23) Ep11
programme.desc: The Judge questions two women about their romantic choices when horrible allegations of abuse come to light. When a woman's car and a dog collide, a fantastic story about driveway swerving comes into play.

programme.title: Judge Judy (S23) Ep12
programme.desc: Separated parents fight over a tax refund and the cost of clothes. A food delivery man with a handful of Burger King calls 911 after allegedly being bitten by a client's dog.

programme.title: Judge Judy (S23) Ep13
programme.desc: After two young women purchase a mobile home for 4K, the previous owner accidentally burns it down before they can move in. On April 20, a young man is accused of feeding a dog drugged brownies.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The world needed a hero, we got a hedgehog. Superpowered with speed, Sonic races to save the world and stop evil genius Dr. Robotnik from world domination.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: More Now - Pride is adamant the elusive 'Baitfish' has returned and, in attempt to locate his nemesis, he has the team investigate crime scenes and chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, SC.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Stupid is as stupid does, says Forrest Gump as he discusses his relative level of intelligence with a stranger while waiting for a bus. Despite his sub-normal IQ, Gump leads a truly charmed life.

programme.title: Trevor Noah Presents: Josh Johnson
programme.desc: Josh Johnson discusses pandemic-era absurdities, his terrifying encounter with bees, relearning how to be in the world as an avowed weirdo and getting hit on by his friend's grandma.

programme.title: Wrong Turn at Tahoe
programme.desc: A small-time crime boss kills a drug dealer without realizing that the drug dealer works for the biggest crime boss in the country.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The tale of a young New York City publishing magnate who finds himself on an unexpected roller-coaster ride of romance, comedy, suspicion, love, sex and dreams in a mind-bending search for his soul.

programme.title: Extraordinary Measures
programme.desc: A drama centered on the efforts of John and Aileen Crowley to find a researcher who might have a cure for their two children's rare genetic disorder.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Girl On A Bicycle
programme.desc: Paolo, an Italian in Paris, has just proposed to his German girlfriend when he bumps into a pretty French girl. Smitten, Paolo took some bad advice from a friend and finds his life upside-down with a German fiancée, a French "wife" and two Aussie kids.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre
programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brother’s mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brother’s death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: The Traveller: Thief In The Night
programme.desc: Marion was kidnapped on her 8th birthday in Vendee. 29 years later, Judge Elgouarch asked Bareski to resume the investigation because a letter of remorse from the assassin surfaced. Judge Elgouarch’s late father was the investigator of the case then.

programme.title: The Rising Tide
programme.desc: When her father fails to return home, the sound of his boat’s engine is the only thing a daughter has to remember of him. Learning from an elderly mechanic, she wishes to repair her father’s boat in hope of his return.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 2
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: The Traveller: Killer Town
programme.desc: Bareski arrives in a tiny village in the Vosges to investigate the disappearance of a young woman. This disappearance reminds him of the unsolved violent murders of the young Scal family six years ago which caused many inhabitants to flee the village.

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 2
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia
programme.desc: Ena’s fiancé cancels the planned wedding - but just then she learns that she has a family in Croatia. At the sea, under the southern sun, she not only meets her loving grandmother but also a hostile sister-in-law and a romantically inclined fisherman.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: My Father's Bike
programme.desc: When Włodek’s wife suddenly leaves him for another man, the 70-year-old man has a heart attack. His son and grandson visit him, and the inter-generational trio embarks on a long journey to find her. They address past grievances and create new memories.

programme.title: The Traveller: Killer Town
programme.desc: Bareski arrives in a tiny village in the Vosges to investigate the disappearance of a young woman. This disappearance reminds him of the unsolved violent murders of the young Scal family six years ago which caused many inhabitants to flee the village.

programme.title: For Emma & Ever
programme.desc: Emma, a wedding registrar, is unhappily married. When a former lover, Ben, re-appears in her life with a fiancée in tow, she’s taken a back. Long buried emotions come flooding back, and Emma is faced with a difficult decision to make.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

programme.title: It's Your Turn, Honey!
programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her “holy” reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery – the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: Nobadi
programme.desc: Heinrich, a cranky 93-year-old, hires Afghan refugee, Adib, to dig his dog’s grave. Adib falls unconscious from a wound but refuses to go to a hospital for fear of deportation. And the two strangers, Heinrich and Adib, spend a dramatic night together.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: Offering a new take on J.M. Barrie's classic story of a flying boy who never ages, acclaimed British director Joe Wright reimagines the ageless tale for audiences worldwide. programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep1
programme.desc: The World Needs S'more People Like You - Ten home bakers must create a dessert that represents their personality.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep2
programme.desc: Choc Full Of Impressions - Nine remaining home bakers use everyday items to make lasting chocolate impressions on the judges. Immunity is on the line for the bakers who are hoping for a fruitful outcome in the chocolate elimination challenge.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep3
programme.desc: Chocolate Panning, Spice & Everything Nice - The eight home bakers take on the ancient chocolate making technique of panning. The Chocolate Elimination Challenge gets a little spicy when the bakers are asked to infuse some fun flavors into their confections.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep4
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror On The Glaze - Seven remaining competitors strive to mirror perfection when Chef Anna Olson teaches them how to use a mirror glaze technique. The home bakers create a decadent dessert inspired by a bestselling chocolate treat.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep5
programme.desc: I Have A Confection To Make - Only six home bakers remain and it's truly a spectacle, as they work in teams to take on the crown jewel of chocolate confections: the bonbon. It's bon voyage for one baker who fails to deliver an indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep6
programme.desc: Life Is What You Bake It - The remaining bakers create centerpieces out of ordinary cupcakes.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep7
programme.desc: Don't Be Afraid To Take Whisks - A 3D chocolate molding Technique Test gives the bakers one last chance to impress the judges and secure their spot in the final 3. One baker is given the opportunity of a lifetime.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep8
programme.desc: The Finale: Good Things Come To Those Who Bake - The top three home bakers take on their toughest challenge yet: creating an epic assortment of show-stopping confections to fill their dream Bake Shop window.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Do You Have What It Bakes? - Ten home bakers dive into the wonderful world of chocolate and must tackle the art of table tempering. Creativity runs wild as the home bakers create a chocolate dessert based on an animal that best represents them.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Where There's A Whisk, There's A Way - The nine home bakers use chocolate to create playful and delicious vessels to hold their desserts in their Technique Test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Time To Glaze The Bar - The eight home bakers make a solar system cake for their technique test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Moved To Tiers - Sweet safety is on the line for the seven remaining home bakers. In the Technique Test, the bakers learn how to incorporate a rainbow of color into their desserts and create edible works of art.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Donut Give Up - The top six home bakers get their sweet on and create a dynamic chocolate sculpture for their Technique Test. Then the bakers get some sweet inspiration from home to spark the creation of a dozen delicious donuts.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bake It Till You Make It - The five remaining home bakers must create a beautiful collection of bonbons for their Technique Test. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers must create a dessert showcasing chocolate as a solid, liquid and a gas.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The World's First Volcano - Nine months after visiting Europe's most active volcano, Etna in Italy, it erupted. Neighbouring volcanoes Stromboli and Vulcano are now also showing signs of imminent eruption.

programme.desc: Louisiana - Robson is in America's deep south on the Tennessee River where he catches catfish in his hands. Then he's off to the Gulf of Mexico for blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Commuters - This episode explores whether the secret to an animal's success in is to keep one foot in the wild and one in the city, becoming a wild commuter. They must overcome the unique challenges the urban world throws at them to benefit from the opportunities on offer.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Expedition Unseen - Steve takes on four entirely new adventures to remote parts of the planet - including Saudi Arabia, Gabon and Mexico - in search of precious natural wonders.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Discover how the St Louis Rail Station went from being the biggest in the United States to falling into disrepair.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Coldness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the Frozen Wilds of Manitoba, North Canada, and visits a town that sometimes has more polar bears than people.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bears on the Move - Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Great Karoo - In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now it’s a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the “underwater movie capital of the world”. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park - In the southern reaches of Africa’s great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wine’s New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Little Penguin - Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australia’s biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Aerial Hunters - Australia’s birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australia’s aerial hunters.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Feathering Nest - Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Little Penguin - Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australia’s biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep6

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep13
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stuck Toys - When Noddy arrives at Toy Green Station, he finds some toys stuck to the ground: someone has spread some glue all over the station platform! Why would someone do that? Noddy investigates.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Untidy Pirates - It's Tidy Toyland Day and Noddy wants to win the Tidy Toyland Trophy. Unfortunately he's also invited the untidy Pirates round to play! Noddy has to figure out how he can play with the Pirates and win the Tidy Toyland Trophy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep15
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Race - It's the Brickabuild Sports & Fun Day and Clockwork Mouse tells Carlton she doesn't want ANY accidents. But when the Egg & Spoon Race comes to a grinding halt, Noddy has to find out who is trying to ruin the race.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Investigation Kit - It's the Royal Egg Hunt and Noddy's investigation kit goes missing. With Bumpy and Revs, Noddy soon finds some of his things, but not his binoculars. Someone must be using them, but what for? Noddy needs to find out in time before the Egg Hunt starts.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep13
programme.desc: Marsha Wonderful Life - Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Hear It For Big Chris - Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep15
programme.desc: Funny Business - Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel… the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep7
programme.desc: Scare Scouts / Boo - Scare Scouts When Frankengymteacher forms a scout troop, Casper is the first to sign up. Boo! During a visit to Deedstown, Casper and his friends are shocked to find the humans dressed as scary creatures…it must Halloween!

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep8
programme.desc: Abra-Ca-Deedstown / Shrinky Dust - Abra-Ca-Deedstown From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. Shrinky Dust When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep57
programme.desc: Too Many Cats - A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep5
programme.desc: Hang Ten in Tahiti - Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep9
programme.desc: Olivia Claus - It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring – Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia Ep10
programme.desc: Olivia Takes Ballet - Olivia is determined to dance just like the ballerinas she's seen in a ballet; the only thing she needs is a partner. Luckily, Uncle Garret (a professional football player) is visiting, and the two of them dance a surprisingly graceful pas de deux for Olivia's whole class.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep9
programme.desc: Horse Powered Dinkie - Farmer Green tells the cars about olden days, when the only transport was horse and cart. Maxi and Drifter say they would never be seen travelling that slow… or would they?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep10
programme.desc: Fb's Sleepover - FB is excited about his sleepover with the other cars in the workshop but when the night draws in he is unsure of his unfamiliar surroundings. Big Chris helps set him at his ease

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S6) Ep16
programme.desc: Silent Disco - Captain HeyHo likes her peace and quiet. Unfortunately for her, Cook and Line have found an old boombox, which is very loud and still working perfectly!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep13

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Mount Rushmore, USA - When the Grimbots add Glitch's face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep36

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep29

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Rainbows - Nelly and Nora make rainbows for everyone.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep17

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep29

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep48

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep75

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep76
programme.desc: Orange Is The New Snack - Mo's pet hamster is looking forward to a snack... but Doug-Po has eaten all the carrots!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: Seesaw - Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - Duggee is having a lovely cup of tea in his favourite cup when Roly surprises him with a very loud peek-a-boo! It is so loud that Duggee jumps and drops his cup which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep34

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: The Search For The Five Keys - When the power fails in Gumnut Gorge, the Numtums find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep76
programme.desc: Orange Is The New Snack - Mo's pet hamster is looking forward to a snack... but Doug-Po has eaten all the carrots!
