programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Bad Business / Anniversorry - Sammy are Hugo are running for Junior Business Club President, but when the votes come in they are tied...// Dada and Dadi's anniversary party is at the same time as arcade night! Can the boys find a way to be in two places at once?

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep110
programme.desc: A Very Rocky Rakhi/The Back Up Plan - It's Raksha Bandhan but Sammy can think of nothing worse than spending the day bonding with his sister. // The boys back up the App for safe keeping. Unfortunately, a tech malfunction causes the app to download to every phone on the house wifi!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Game Show - Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Tour Bus - When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Time Capsule - When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep147
programme.desc: Hide and Then What Happens? / Shellback Shenanigans - SpongeBob and Patrick play Hide N' Seek and SpongeBob searches the world for Patrick. // Plankton masquerades as Gary to steal the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Survival of the Unfittest / Nixed Signals - When Arturo realizes Bobby doesn't have survival skills, he decides bring Bobby to the woods for training! // Frida asks Carlota to spend a spa day with her to enjoy quality time, but can they both stay off their phones?

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Hand-Me-Downer / Sleuth or Consequences - After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynn's cool BMX bike without telling her. // Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Butterfly Effect / The Green House - After spilling an experiment of Lisa's, Lincoln sets off a chain reaction that unravels the household. // In an effort to be more energy-efficient Lincoln rallies his family to stop using so much electricity.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep27
programme.desc: Pre-Hibernation Week / Life Of Crime - Sandy is going into hibernation in a week and she wants to pack in a million activities. // SpongeBob and Patrick end up popping Mr. Krabs balloon and fear the consequences.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep188
programme.desc: Kenny the Cat / Yeti Krabs - SpongeBob will do anything to get to meet his newest hero, Kenny The Cat. // Attempting to get more work out of Squidward, Mr. Krabs spins the story of the monstrous Yeti Crab, which eats lazy workers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Señor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep57
programme.desc: Krabby Land / The Camping Episode - Mr. Krabs aims to squeeze every penny out of kids on summer break by building a playground in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick lure Squidward to their backyard campout.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep58
programme.desc: Missing Identity / Plankton's Army - Spongebob desperately searches for his missing name tag. // Plankton enlists his relatives to help him steal the Krabby Patty Secret Formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep59
programme.desc: The Spongebob SquarePants Lost Episodes - SpongeBob is jellyfishing when he wistfully realizes that he wants to fly. // Patchy the Pirate is set to present a never before seen episode of Spongebob with one problem - no tape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep61
programme.desc: Fear of a Krabby Patty / Shell of a Man - With the Krusty Krab's new "open 24 hours" policy, the employees must work 'round the clock. // Mr. Krabs loses his shell right before a big reunion with his old buddies.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep104
programme.desc: I Named It Whiskers / How Angus Got His Groove Back - After one of Lily's inventions goes haywire, she enlists Parker's help to get it back under control. // Angus loses his lucky beanie, which causes him to revert back to being a child.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116
programme.desc: P.I.R.A.T.E. - Parker, Angus, and Russell must save the S.S. Steadfast from being taken by pirates.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Warriors of Kyoshi - As one of Aang's little detours, the group heads toward the island of Kyoshi. But soon they learn that the townspeople don't trust foreigners at all; however, when Aang proves to them that he is the Avatar they are treated as guests of honor.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper - It's off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out it’s to free her brother Francis who happens to be a “mind-jacked” Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Insane in the Crane Game / Buhdeuce Goes Berserks - SwaySway and Buhdeuce become obsessed with winning a toy out of the new crane game that's been installed at Pumpers. // When Buhdeuce gets a bad haircut, he goes berserks, and now SwaySway has to calm his buddy down before he gets busted by Rambamboo

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.desc: Ricky's Rules/Monkey See, Monkey Do/Champions Of The Day/Rain Music/An Interesting Hunt/What Now?/Bubble Trouble/Let's Roar! - Visiting the Plains, Bop and Boo get a surprise, when their RACCOON friend, Ricky, arrives with a toy golf set. He challenges the Bunnies to a game.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes Ep45B/Ep46A/Ep46B/Ep47A/Ep47B
programme.desc: Baby Brouhaha/Log Cabin Fever/A Mid-Autumn Night's Scream/Are We There Yet?/Save Our Cinnamon - Overhearing Granny on the phone say that she's "expecting a baby," Baby Bugs goes into overdrive, revving up the Baby Looney Tunes

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep17/Ep18/Ep19/Ep20
programme.desc: Adopt a Vampire/Haunted Dog House/Lucky Vampire's Foot/Ghost Chef - After Chester decides to get rid of Bunnicula by passing him off to someone else at an all-night pet adoption fair, he soon begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep3B/Ep19B/Ep35A/Ep56A/Ep72A/Ep90A/Ep108A/Ep125B
programme.desc: Leaf It Alone/Dust Bugster/Thirst Things First/Sam and the Bullet Train/Sir Littlechin and the Kraken/Area Fifty Run/North Pole Position/No Duck is an Island - Wile E. Coyote attempts to show Bugs the future of yard maintenance, with limited results.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep9/Ep10
programme.desc: Battle Of The Humungonauts/Howl Of The Fright Hound - A pair of brutal Gargantuas break apart the town.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep8B/Ep16A/Ep4B/Ep19B/Ep7A/Ep22C/Ep12A/Ep26A
programme.desc: Egg Beats/Don't Bring Your Pet to School/Hi Robot/A Life Less Guarded/Octo Suave/24 Karat Kat/Destruction Junction/Game of Cat and Mouse - The booming, city hip-hop beats of Jerry's wind-up car cause country chicken farmer Tom's chicken to lay mass quantities of eggs.

programme.title: Chowder Ep4A/Ep24B/Ep14A/Ep44A
programme.desc: Certifrycation Class/The Catch Phrase/The Bruised Bluenana/A Little Bit of Pizzazz - When Mung is forced to spend the day in Chef Certifrycation school, he butts heads with a fickle instructor.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep33/Ep47
programme.desc: Go Goo Go/The Big Cheese - Goo believes Mac is her boyfriend...

programme.title: Journey Of Long Ep7/Ep20/Ep33/Ep47
programme.desc: A Secret Friend/Let's Workout!/The Champion/Long's Challenge - At the restaurant, Long is approached by Centi, a new worker he has not seen before. He enjoys fun times on the rooftop every night with Centi but how come Centi's only there at night?

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep107/Ep148/Ep192/Ep134/Ep174
programme.desc: Tiara Trouble/15 Minutes of Fame/Blossom3/Odd Bubbles Out/The Buttercup Job - Bubbles' excitement over being a contestant in The Townsville Pageant is ruined when Blossom and Buttercup become overbearing stage-sisters.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep107/Ep148/Ep187/Ep209/Ep241
programme.desc: Freaky Gwen Ben/Screamcatcher/Poles Apart/Four By Four/The Greatest Lake - Ben interferes with malicious magician Hex's quest for the Titan Gloves at a flea market and accidentally switches bodies with Gwen, forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

programme.title: Chowder Ep4A/Ep24B/Ep14A/Ep44A
programme.desc: Certifrycation Class/The Catch Phrase/The Bruised Bluenana/A Little Bit of Pizzazz - When Mung is forced to spend the day in Chef Certifrycation school, he butts heads with a fickle instructor.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep211/Ep212/Ep213/Ep214/Ep215
programme.desc: Snugs To The Rescue/Lickety Split/The Show Must Go On/Not Kitten Around/It’S In The Bag - When Snugs gets a boo-boo on the playground, he’s not sure he wants to play again.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep317/Ep312
programme.desc: Calls Of The Wild In Big Sky Park/Save The Hatchlings In Big Sky Park - Rob records animal calls in the jungle when a Macaw causes chaos by mimicking the calls.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders Ep3/Ep7
programme.desc: Race Track Race/Buzz In - The Looney Builders build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack.

programme.title: Tangranimals Ep121/Ep104
programme.desc: The Scary Voice/The Chew Ball Race - Oula's voice scares some young Tangra-dinos...

programme.title: Batwheels Ep8/Ep11
programme.desc: Up In The Air/Riddle Me This - Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to Batwing.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders Ep16/Ep15

programme.desc: And, Action!/Echo Monster - Alice suggests she and Lewis make a film as a birthday gift for the Twee Twins: Lewis will play the hero, "Super Lewis!"

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep5
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep14
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep8
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2304
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - In 1989, through the joint collaboration of the Catalan Autonomous Government, the Montmeló Town Council and the Royal Automobile Club of Catalunya (RACC), work began on giving one of Europe’s most beautiful cities a state of the art race track to match. The Circuit de Catalunya opened on the doorstep of Barcelona in September 1991 and welcomed its first international event that same month, hosting the Spanish F1 Grand Prix. It went on to host the European Motorcycle Grand Prix and in 1995 became home to the Gran Premio de Catalunya. Considered to be one of the best designed circuits of the recent era, the Circuito de Catalunya won the much coveted IRTA ‘Best Grand Prix’ trophy for 2001 and has a general admission capacity of 104,000 spectators.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2304
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022
